reviewText: Oh, my WORD!!!  I loooooooooooooooooove this album... it is soooooo beautiful and soothing and relaxing and wonderful.  Some of the selections are dreamy and calming, and there are also a few really upbeat and energizing pieces on it, too.  And I'm a "tough customer" who is difficult to satisfy, so if I say that this recording is really nice, you can count on it that it is OUTSTANDING!  Highly, HIGHLY recommended!
